body:
Hey folks,

So recently, Skype added a new "web" version of Skype. It's still in beta, but you can now apparently create a Skype account and use Skype functionally without having to download anything onto your computer. 

For anyone that has any knowledge on this, I decided to add some of my old pals back on Skype that I haven't spoken to in ages. However, under each name it says "presence unknown" and a few of them got back to me in alternative ways saying they got my Skype request; but on my end it says my friend request is still pending. Anyone know anything about this? If so, let me know in the comments please.

Regards, -Jake

title: Skype Online - Troubles

replies.body: Although I have no experience with this new version of Skype, I'm guessing these problems are due to the fact that everything's still in beta so you'll obviously be running into a few bugs here and there.
